title: President William Jefferson Clinton Birthplace Home National Historic Site: Park Home
body: "I still believe in a place called Hope." President Clinton  On August 19, 1946, Virginia Blythe gave birth to her son, William Jefferson Blythe, III. Named for his father who died before he was born, he grew up to become William Jefferson Clinton - the 42nd president of the United States. In this house, he learned many of the early lessons that defined his life and his presidency.              President Clinton Birthplace Home   "In this house I learned to walk and talk, I learned to pray, I learned to read..." President Bill Clinton            We are opening for tours July 30th.   Living room in the President Bill Clinton Birthplace Home.        Story Corps Comes to Hope, Arkansas!   Story Corps              2016 Junior Ranger Camp   Junior Rangers at the Little Rock 9 panel at the Clinton Presidential Center.        Featured Parks   Overlook at Gunnison Point        Pokémon Go   The President William Jefferson Clinton Birthplace Home NHS Pokéstop.
